mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT P.POST_NUMBER, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_DATE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NUMBER, P.BOARD_ID FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE P.BOARD_ID = 1 ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(P.POST_NUMBER) FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE P.BOARD_ID = 1 ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT P.POST_NUMBER, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_DATE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NUMBER, P.BOARD_ID FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE P.BOARD_ID = 1 OR P.BOARD_ID = 2 ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
